description:
Lightweight Armoury Crate alternative for Asus laptops.

Small and lightweight Armoury Crate alternative for Asus laptops offering almost same functionality without extra bloat and unnecessary services. Works on all popular models, such as ROG Zephyrus G14, G15, G16, M16, Flow X13, Flow X16, Flow Z13, TUF Series, Strix / Scar Series, ProArt, VivoBook and many more!
Changes since last final release 0.191
- Flicker free dimming hotkey fix #3152
- Adjusted minimum possible number of E-Cores for Intel models #3160
- Strix impact DPI correction #3146
- Touchscreen toggle toast tweaks #3143
- Extra delay when setting Ultimate from Eco #3170
- Option for Slash Lighting "sleep" animation on lid-close 
- Option to disable automated mode switching on power source change #3139
- Auto download of correct color profiles if Visual Mode / Color Gamut refuses to work
- Dependencies update (charts component and task scheduler)
- Fixed situation when config could reset in some situations
- Minor UI tweaks
:floppy_disk: Download App
